## Modelo de Estratificación del Dengue en México

```{r, echo=FALSE}
DiagrammeR::grViz("digraph {
                  # graph definitions
  graph [layout = dot, rankdir = TB]
  
  # node definitions
  node [shape = square, style = filled, color = grey,
  fixedsize = true, width = .5] 
  
  ###########
  sinave [label = 'Sinave',  fillcolor =  'DodgerBlue', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'black']
  cases [label = 'Casos',  fillcolor =  'DodgerBlue', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'black']
  cases_a [label = '2008-2015',  fillcolor =  'DodgerBlue', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'black']
  cases_b [label = '2016-2021',  fillcolor =  'DodgerBlue', color = 'white', fontcolor = 'black']
  
  sinave -> cases -> {cases_a, cases_b}
  
}",
                  height = 300)
```
